_items.name: PLAYER (LARA)
_responsibilities: Uses input & isSwimming variable to set animation of sprite
Show health on health bar (amount passed as argument)
public Take damage function (amount passed as argument)
public Die function (take damage for current health value)
public Start/Stop Swimming function (sets isSwimming bool)
public Collect loot function (amount passed as argument)

_items.name: HEALTHBAR
_responsibilities: display's player's health on a worldspace canvas
public Setup Health function (max health passed as argument)
public Set Health function (health value passed as argument)

_items.name: WATER
_responsibilities: holds list of all water SpriteRenderers
checks if player position is inside bounds of any water
tells Player if they just entered water
tells Player if they just exited water
